raw_text: Violations observed: 21 CFR 211.22(b), 21 CFR 211.113(a). Inadequate quality unit authority and contamination control.
Inspection noted deficiencies against 21 CFR 600.11 and 21 CFR 211.160(b) including lab controls.
Observed 21 CFR 110.80 and misbranding concerns; sanitation and process controls inadequate.
